snippet.title: Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord | Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now on GOG and Steam: http://www.digitaleclipse.com/games/wizardry 

Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord is a full 3D remake of the first game in the legendary Wizardry series of RPGs.

The first party-based RPG video game ever released, Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord was a direct inspiration to series like Final Fantasy and Dragon Quest. Digital Eclipse's revival preserves the appeal of the classic, with many upgrades for modern role-playing game fans.

Links
Digital Eclipse Official Site - http://www.digitaleclipse.com
Digital Eclipse Twitter - http://www.twitter.com/DigitalEclipse
Digital Eclipse Twitch Channel - http://www.twitch.tv/digitaleclipsestudios
Digital Eclipse Instagram - http://www.instagram.com/digitaleclipsestudios
Digital Eclipse Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/DigitalEclipseSoftware
